Localization (String Tables)¶

CommonLocalizationUtils¶

class CommonLocalizationUtils¶

Bases: object

Utilities for handling localization strings.

class LocalizedTooltip(string_id: Union[int, str, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString], *tokens: Any)¶

Bases: sims4.localization.TunableLocalizedStringFactory._Wrapper

A LocalizedTooltip used when displaying tooltips.

static colorize(localized_string: protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString, text_color: sims4communitylib.utils.localization.common_localized_string_colors.CommonLocalizedStringColor = CommonLocalizedStringColor.DEFAULT) → protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString¶

Color the text of a LocalizedString with the specified color.

Parameters

  • localized_string – The LocalizedString to set the text color of.

  • text_color – The text will become this color.

Returns

A LocalizedString with text in the specified color.

static create_from_int(identifier: int, *tokens: Any) → protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString¶

Locate a LocalizedString by an identifier and format tokens into it.

Parameters

  • identifier – A decimal number that identifies an existing LocalizedString.

  • tokens – A collection of objects to format into the LocalizedString. (Example types: LocalizedString, str, int, etc.)

Returns

A LocalizedString with the specified tokens formatted into it.

static create_from_string(string_text: str) → protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString¶

Create a LocalizedString from a string.

Parameters

string_text – The string to localize. The resulting LocalizedString will be ‘{0.String}’

Returns

A LocalizedString created from the specified string.

static create_localized_string(identifier: Union[int, str, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString], tokens: Tuple[Any] = (), localize_tokens: bool = True, text_color: sims4communitylib.utils.localization.common_localized_string_colors.CommonLocalizedStringColor = CommonLocalizedStringColor.DEFAULT) → protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString¶

Create a LocalizedString formatted with the specified tokens.

Parameters

  • identifier – An identifier to locate a LocalizedString with, text that will be turned into a LocalizedString, or a LocalizedString itself.

  • tokens – A collection of objects to format into the localized string. (They can be anything. LocalizedString, str, int, SimInfo, just to name a few)

  • localize_tokens – If True, the specified tokens will be localized. If False, the specified tokens will be formatted into the LocalizedString as they are. Default is True

  • text_color – The color the text will be when displayed.

Returns

An object of type LocalizedString

static create_localized_tooltip(tooltip_text: Union[int, str, protocolbuffers.Localization_pb2.LocalizedString], tooltip_tokens: Tuple[Any] = ()) → LocalizedTooltip¶

Create a LocalizedTooltip use this when you wish to display a tooltip on various things.

Parameters

  • tooltip_text – The text that will be displayed.

  • tooltip_tokens – A collection of objects to format into the localized string. (They can be anything. LocalizedString, str, int, SimInfo, just to name a few)

Returns

An object of type LocalizedTooltip

CommonLocalizedStringColor¶

class CommonLocalizedStringColor¶

Bases: sims4communitylib.enums.enumtypes.int_enum.CommonEnumIntBase

Colors for adding color to the text of LocalizedStrings.

GREEN = CommonLocalizedStringColor.GREEN¶
